double_crochet ch1 clusters and 4 double_crochet row = 4 10 cm on larger next row chain 3 counts as 1 double_crochet work double_crochet in each st on hook after blocking next row 144 sts hook 1 us i/9 5 5mm hook work border 1 us g/6 4mm hook cut silk blend no 1 and work border with harmony check your gauge and adjust hook size s accordingly if necessary notions round 1 work half_double_crochet in each stitch around entire perimeter of tapestry needle shawl working 2 half_double_crochet in each of three corners the exact size stitch count does not matter as long as the sts are worked 19 5 49 5 cm depth and 38 96 5 cm at widest point evenly skills double_crochet chain and half_double_crochet stitches edging crochet from charts optional row 1 rs ch1 counts as 1 single_crochet *ch4 skip 1 half_double_crochet single_crochet in next half_double_crochet repeat from * to end worthy of note row 2 ws slip_stitch to top of ch4 loop *single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in top of loop chain 1 repeat from * to end this simple and fun shawl is worked back and forth from the bottom up using either written or charted instructions finishing depending on your gauge you may be able to work more fasten_off and weave in ends or fewer repeats of the pattern be sure to stop with enough yarn to work the double_crochet edging before the border soak in cool water and soak wash and block to
